comments.raw_text:
Somewhat randomly, I just noticed that js/src/ctypes/libffi/configure.ac has a check for whether .cfi directives are accepted. That seems preferable to my __GCC_HAVE_DWARF2_CFI_ASM test, especially with people starting to use clang.

(Besides, it's my turn for a CFI patch.)
comments.author: sphink@gmail.com
